title: Issue with name creation censorship
body:
Hi, I'd been wanting to change my name to 'Lucky Seven' but it wasn't available - I tried a few combinations, and long story short nothing beginning with "Lucky S" is accepted, no combination of letters after that. I figured it's because of the letters luc(KY S) in the name. 
Is there any workaround for this? I'd like to use it. 

Thanks
